aboutCard.title: About Me
aboutCard.content:
I am currently a 4th year BSIT student at La Consolacion University
Philippines. I am passionate about technology and love to explore new
trends in the tech world. I like to solve problems and find a creative
solution to them. I am interested in front-end development,
automations, and self-hosting.

accordCard0.title: N8N
accordCard0.subtitle: a self-hosted workflow automation tool
accordCard0.content: In my problem solving journey, I discovered N8N, a powerful workflow automation tool that allows me to automate tasks and integrate various services seamlessly. It has become an essential part of my toolkit.

accordCard1.title: Figma
accordCard1.subtitle: a collaborative interface design tool
accordCard1.content: During our web development projects, I utilize Figma to create user interface designs and prototypes. Its collaborative features allow me to work seamlessly with team members and gather feedback efficiently.

accordCard2.title: Self-hosting
accordCard2.subtitle: lots of amazing tech tools for free
accordCard2.content: Self-hosting allows me to take control of my applications and data. I can run various services on my own server, giving me the freedom to customize and optimize my setup. It's a great way to learn and experiment with new technologies. I use docker desktop to self-host my applications and services.
